newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: Comalco to sell wheel plant to Reynolds.
newsitem.headline: Comalco to sell wheel plant to Reynolds.

text.p: Australian alumunium producer Comalco Ltd on Tuesday said it expected to soon sell its wheel-making plant in Tasmania to Reynolds Metals Co.
Comalco spokesman Ian Head declined to disclose the sale price or the book value of the asset but said the impact on Comalco's profit and loss account would not be material.
But Head confirmed a newspaper report that the company had invested around A$50 million in the plant, which makes wheels for domestic and overseas car manufacturers.
